title: Unforced Errors (LIVE from Philadelphia, PA)
description: DeRay, Sam and Brittany are LIVE from Underground Arts in Philadelphia, PA. Plus, DeRay is joined by Philly district attorney Larry Krasner to discuss equity and criminal justice.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
